text:
Since lessons are over,
should I go back to my room and rest...?
How about the training camp, Juri?

Oh, thanks to everyone,
it's been going smoothly.

It's really great to be able to focus
on lessons from morning to night.
Hopefully, I'll level up by the time it's over.

Yeah,
I'm sure you can do it, Juri.

We all eat together,
and we can talk until late at night.

I feel like I get a lot of energy from it,
and I can work hard the next day too.

I see...!
That's good to hear.
